pageContent.descriptionText:
Checking InYou meet with Will Bennett and raise the issue of the co-pay cards that were discussed the last time you met. You inquire whether Sunnydale has used the cards yet, and if so, whether you’ve received any patient feedback.

Dr. Bennett replies that he has given out a few of the co-pay cards, but so far it’s a little early to know the results.

You respond that you are glad Dr. Bennett was able to try them, and agree to check back in a week.
